description: React component for managing and displaying camp jobs and assignments, including fetching, creating, assigning, and deleting jobs with admin controls.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the list of jobs from the server and updates the state.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Handles the creation of a new job via form submission.

methods.name: onAssign
methods.description: Assigns a volunteer (user) to a specific job.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a specific job after confirmation.
